sumando <- 11233454667898 + 1234135435
sumando2 <- 123423423434 + 2345234
restando <- 23455656345345456 - 23454356456
restando2 <- 12341234213423 - 23432452 
multiplicando <- 234523452345 * 1234342341234
multiplicando2 <- 23423453245234 * 23453245345245
suma_c <- restando + multiplicando
dividendo <- 1234234234234/3423423424545
dividendo2 <- 123421342134/135434564564
potenciando <- 5^2 
potenciando2 <- 4^4
